module.name: gpg
module.summary: Policy for GNU Privacy Guard and related programs.

template.name: gpg_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the gpg module.

desc.p: This template creates the types and rules for GPG, GPG-agent, and GPG helper programs. This protects the user keys and secrets, and runs the programs in domains specific to the user type.
This is invoked automatically for each user and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: role
param.summary: The role associated with the user.

template.name: gpg_domtrans_user_gpg
template.summary: Transition to a user gpg domain.

desc.p: Transition to a user gpg domain.
This is a templated interface, and should only be called from a per-userdomain template.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

template.summary: Send generic signals to user gpg processes.

desc.p: This is a templated interface, and should only be called from a per-userdomain template.
